'''16w32b''' is the second [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.11]], released on August 11, 2016<ref>https://web.archive.org/web/0/https://www.mojang.com/2016/08/minecraft-snapshot-16w32a/</ref> to fix some bugs and crashes from [[16w32a]].

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''All sloped [[rail]] types'''
* Hitbox heights are decreased from a full block to a half of a block.

=== Mobs ===
'''Green-robed [[villager]]s'''
* Re-added this entity as <code>Profession:5</code>; its name is shown in the [[trading]] GUI as "Nitwit".
* Spawns naturally in villages.
* When spawned naturally in a village, or from an egg, it has no trades.

'''Green-robed [[zombie villager]]s'''
* Re-added this entity as <code>Profession:5</code>.
* Spawns naturally anywhere zombie villagers spawn.

=== Command format ===
* {{cmd|title}} can now display text in the action bar position.
